Home » 40P17 Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikatikapaṭṭhānapāḷi (5)
4 Kusalattika, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
Kusalattika, Saṃkiliṭṭhattika
15.
35Akusalaṃ saṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naakusalo nasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā tīṇi, adhipatiyā tīṇi…pe…  avigate tīṇi.
36Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naabyākato naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naabyākato naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā naakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naabyākato naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paccayā nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca naakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhasaṃkilesiko ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.) Hetuyā cha, ārammaṇe cha…pe…  āsevane pañca…pe…  vipāke tīṇi, avigate cha.
16.
37Kusalaṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi.
38Abyākataṃ asaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesikaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nakusalo naasaṃkiliṭṭhaasaṃkilesiko dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā…  tīṇi. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
39Hetuyā cha, adhipatiyā cha…pe…  vipāke tīṇi…pe…  avigate cha.
